Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.librarymanagement.service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
This class provides services related to user management, such as register, login, list, update, and delete.
Author:
KishorMuruganandham

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser (User user) throws ServiceException
      Register a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object to be registered.
      Returns:
      True if the user is registered successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's a problem with the service.

    • loginUser

      public User loginUser (User user) throws ServiceException
      Log in a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing login information.
      Returns:
      The user object if login is successful.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's a problem with the service.

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById (int userId) throws ServiceException
      Retrieve a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user id of the user to be Retrieved.
      Returns:
      The user object if login is successful.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's a problem with the service.

    • getUserByEmail

      public User getUserByEmail (String email) throws ServiceException
      Retrieve a user by their email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The user object if found, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's a problem with the service.

    • listAllUser

      public List<User> listAllUser() throws ServiceException
      Get a list of all users.
      Returns:
      A list of user objects.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's a problem with the service.

    • editUser

      public boolean editUser (User user) throws ServiceException
      Edit a user's information.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing updated information.
      Returns:
      True if the user is updated successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's a problem with the service.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser (String email) throws ServiceException
      Delete a user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the user is deleted successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's a problem with the service.
